meanings.definition: Resembling a beak in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The bird had a beaklike nose that made it look unique.
meanings.sent2: The flower petals were arranged in a beaklike formation.
meanings.sent3: The beaklike design of the car's front grille gave it a fierce look.
meanings.sent4: Her beaklike earrings added a touch of whimsy to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The beaklike shadow of the tree branch fell across the path.
